about_the_game:
Explore the lands of Sophiza and defeat monsters with various arrow types and abilities. Traverse on treacherous platforms with your mobility skills. Go on an epic adventure about a young archer to put an ancient evil back in its cage


Explore the lands of Sophiza filled with challenges and treacherous platforms. You can jump, wall jump and shoot yourself through the air with your dash. Slide around on the ground or perform the ultimate power dash to destroy objects or enemies in your path.




Defeat monsters with your standard, elemental or other physical arrow types. You can find these arrow types during your play-through and can help during challenging fights. Draw your bow and choose the moment to let go, resulting in a normal or perfect shot. Collect Power Wisps to activate the Power Stance making shots even more powerful! Together with your perfect draw on the bow the arrow types can have surprising effect on all that roam the world.




An ancient evil named Yord was imprisoned 1000 years ago. After that, all the creatures and monsters lost their rage and roamed the world in a more manageable fashion. The archers from the villages, including Whimsy Woods, need to keep those creatures and monsters at bay. But in the last 10 years, the ancient evil created cracks in the prison through which it can release its toxic thoughts and infect the creatures and monsters. The creatures and monsters become enraged, making them harder to defeat and unpredictable. The influence of the ancient evil becomes stronger and stronger.
